* Emacs inf-ruby package

In my existing Emacs setup, the [[https://github.com/nonsequitur/inf-ruby][inf-ruby package]] won't create the irb
prompt correctly unless this is added.

#+begin_src ruby

  IRB.conf[:USE_MULTILINE] = false if ENV['INSIDE_EMACS']
  IRB.conf[:USE_READLINE] = false if ENV['INSIDE_EMACS']

#+end_src
